problem_names:
lemma lerch_lemma_real:
  fixes h::"real \<Rightarrow> real"
  assumes h_cont[continuous_intros]: "continuous_on {0 .. 1} h"
  assumes int_0: "\<And>n. ((\<lambda>u. u ^ n * h u) has_integral 0) {0 .. 1}"
  assumes u: "0 \<le> u" "u \<le> 1"
  shows "h u = 0"

lemma lerch_lemma:
  fixes h::"real \<Rightarrow> 'a::euclidean_space"
  assumes [continuous_intros]: "continuous_on {0 .. 1} h"
  assumes int_0: "\<And>n. ((\<lambda>u. u ^ n *\<^sub>R h u) has_integral 0) {0 .. 1}"
  assumes u: "0 \<le> u" "u \<le> 1"
  shows "h u = 0"
translations:
lemma lerch_lemma_real:
  fixes h::"real \<Rightarrow> real"
  assumes h_cont[continuous_intros]: "continuous_on {0 .. 1} h"
  assumes int_0: "\<And>n. ((\<lambda>u. u ^ n * h u) has_integral 0) {0 .. 1}"
  assumes u: "0 \<le> u" "u \<le> 1"
  shows "h u = 0"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. h u = 0
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. h u = 0
from Stone_Weierstrass_uniform_limit[OF compact_Icc h_cont]

proof (chain)
picking this:
  (\<And>g.
      \<lbrakk>uniform_limit {0..1} g h sequentially;
       \<And>n. polynomial_function (g n)\<rbrakk>
      \<Longrightarrow> ?thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
  ?thesis
obtain g where g: "uniform_limit {0..1} g h sequentially" "polynomial_function (g n)" for n

proof (prove)
using this:
  (\<And>g.
      \<lbrakk>uniform_limit {0..1} g h sequentially;
       \<And>n. polynomial_function (g n)\<rbrakk>
      \<Longrightarrow> ?thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
  ?thesis

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>g.
        \<lbrakk>uniform_limit {0..1} g h sequentially;
         \<And>n. polynomial_function (g n)\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by blast

proof (state)
this:
  uniform_limit {0..1} g h sequentially
  polynomial_function (g ?n)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. h u = 0
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  uniform_limit {0..1} g h sequentially
  polynomial_function (g ?n)
have rpf_g: "real_polynomial_function (g n)" for n

proof (prove)
using this:
  uniform_limit {0..1} g h sequentially
  polynomial_function (g ?n)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. real_polynomial_function (g n)
by (simp add: real_polynomial_function_eq)

proof (state)
this:
  real_polynomial_function (g ?n)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. h u = 0
let ?P = "\<lambda>n x. h x * g n x"

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. h u = 0
have continuous_on_g[continuous_intros]: "continuous_on s (g n)" for s n

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. continuous_on s (g n)
by (rule continuous_on_polymonial_function) fact

proof (state)
this:
  continuous_on ?s (g ?n)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. h u = 0
have P_cont: "continuous_on {0 .. 1} (?P n)" for n

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. continuous_on {0..1} (\<lambda>x. h x * g n x)
by (auto intro!: continuous_intros)

proof (state)
this:
  continuous_on {0..1} (\<lambda>x. h x * g ?n x)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. h u = 0
have "uniform_limit {0 .. 1} (\<lambda>n x. h x * g n x) (\<lambda>x. h x * h x) sequentially"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. uniform_limit {0..1} (\<lambda>n x. h x * g n x) (\<lambda>x. h x * h x)
     sequentially
by (auto intro!: uniform_limit_intros g assms compact_imp_bounded compact_continuous_image)

proof (state)
this:
  uniform_limit {0..1} (\<lambda>n x. h x * g n x) (\<lambda>x. h x * h x)
   sequentially

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. h u = 0
from uniform_limit_integral[OF this P_cont]

obtain I J where
    I: "(\<And>n. (?P n has_integral I n) {0..1})"
    and J: "((\<lambda>x. h x * h x) has_integral J) {0..1}"
    and IJ: "I \<longlonglongrightarrow> J"
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  ((\<lambda>x. h x * g ?n x) has_integral I ?n) {0..1}
  ((\<lambda>x. h x * h x) has_integral J) {0..1}
  I \<longlonglongrightarrow> J

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. h u = 0
have "(?P n has_integral 0) {0..1}" for n
proof -
from real_polynomial_function_imp_sum[OF rpf_g]

proof (chain)
picking this:
  \<exists>a n. g ?n1 = (\<lambda>x. \<Sum>i\<le>n. a i * x ^ i)
obtain gn ga where "g n = (\<lambda>x. \<Sum>i\<le>gn. ga i * x ^ i)"

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<exists>a n. g ?n1 = (\<lambda>x. \<Sum>i\<le>n. a i * x ^ i)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>ga gn.
        g n = (\<lambda>x. \<Sum>i\<le>gn. ga i * x ^ i) \<Longrightarrow>
        thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by metis

proof (state)
this:
  g n = (\<lambda>x. \<Sum>i\<le>gn. ga i * x ^ i)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ((\<lambda>x. h x * g n x) has_integral 0) {0..1}
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  g n = (\<lambda>x. \<Sum>i\<le>gn. ga i * x ^ i)
have "?P n x = (\<Sum>i\<le>gn. x ^ i * h x * ga i)" for x

proof (prove)
using this:
  g n = (\<lambda>x. \<Sum>i\<le>gn. ga i * x ^ i)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. h x * g n x = (\<Sum>i\<le>gn. x ^ i * h x * ga i)
by (auto simp: sum_distrib_left algebra_simps)

proof (state)
this:
  h ?x * g n ?x = (\<Sum>i\<le>gn. ?x ^ i * h ?x * ga i)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ((\<lambda>x. h x * g n x) has_integral 0) {0..1}
moreover

proof (state)
this:
  h ?x * g n ?x = (\<Sum>i\<le>gn. ?x ^ i * h ?x * ga i)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ((\<lambda>x. h x * g n x) has_integral 0) {0..1}
have "((\<lambda>x. \<dots> x) has_integral 0) {0 .. 1}"
by (auto intro!: has_integral_sum[THEN has_integral_eq_rhs] has_integral_mult_left assms)
ultimately

proof (chain)
picking this:
  h ?x * g n ?x = (\<Sum>i\<le>gn. ?x ^ i * h ?x * ga i)
  ((\<lambda>x. \<Sum>i\<le>gn. x ^ i * h x * ga i) has_integral 0) {0..1}
show ?thesis
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  ((\<lambda>x. h x * g n x) has_integral 0) {0..1}

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

proof (state)
this:
  ((\<lambda>x. h x * g ?n x) has_integral 0) {0..1}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. h u = 0
with I
have "I n = 0" for n
using has_integral_unique
by blast

proof (state)
this:
  I ?n = 0

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. h u = 0
with IJ J

proof (chain)
picking this:
  I \<longlonglongrightarrow> J
  ((\<lambda>x. h x * h x) has_integral J) {0..1}
  I ?n = 0
have "((\<lambda>x. h x * h x) has_integral 0) (cbox 0 1)"

proof (prove)
using this:
  I \<longlonglongrightarrow> J
  ((\<lambda>x. h x * h x) has_integral J) {0..1}
  I ?n = 0

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ((\<lambda>x. h x * h x) has_integral 0) (cbox 0 1)
by (metis (full_types) LIMSEQ_le_const LIMSEQ_le_const2 box_real(2) dual_order.antisym order_refl)

proof (state)
this:
  ((\<lambda>x. h x * h x) has_integral 0) (cbox 0 1)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. h u = 0
with _ _

proof (chain)
picking this:
  PROP ?psi \<Longrightarrow> PROP ?psi
  PROP ?psi \<Longrightarrow> PROP ?psi
  ((\<lambda>x. h x * h x) has_integral 0) (cbox 0 1)
have "h u * h u = 0"

proof (prove)
using this:
  PROP ?psi \<Longrightarrow> PROP ?psi
  PROP ?psi \<Longrightarrow> PROP ?psi
  ((\<lambda>x. h x * h x) has_integral 0) (cbox 0 1)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. h u * h u = 0
by (rule has_integral_0_cbox_imp_0) (auto intro!: continuous_intros u)

proof (state)
this:
  h u * h u = 0

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. h u = 0
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  h u * h u = 0
show "h u = 0"

proof (prove)
using this:
  h u * h u = 0

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. h u = 0
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  h u = 0

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma lerch_lemma:
  fixes h::"real \<Rightarrow> 'a::euclidean_space"
  assumes [continuous_intros]: "continuous_on {0 .. 1} h"
  assumes int_0: "\<And>n. ((\<lambda>u. u ^ n *\<^sub>R h u) has_integral 0) {0 .. 1}"
  assumes u: "0 \<le> u" "u \<le> 1"
  shows "h u = 0"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. h u = (0::'a)
proof (rule euclidean_eqI)

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>b.
       b \<in> Basis \<Longrightarrow> h u \<bullet> b = (0::'a) \<bullet> b
fix b::'a

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>b.
       b \<in> Basis \<Longrightarrow> h u \<bullet> b = (0::'a) \<bullet> b
assume "b \<in> Basis"

proof (state)
this:
  b \<in> Basis

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>b.
       b \<in> Basis \<Longrightarrow> h u \<bullet> b = (0::'a) \<bullet> b
have "continuous_on {0 .. 1} (\<lambda>x. h x \<bullet> b)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. continuous_on {0..1} (\<lambda>x. h x \<bullet> b)
by (auto intro!: continuous_intros)

proof (state)
this:
  continuous_on {0..1} (\<lambda>x. h x \<bullet> b)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>b.
       b \<in> Basis \<Longrightarrow> h u \<bullet> b = (0::'a) \<bullet> b
moreover

proof (state)
this:
  continuous_on {0..1} (\<lambda>x. h x \<bullet> b)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>b.
       b \<in> Basis \<Longrightarrow> h u \<bullet> b = (0::'a) \<bullet> b
from \<open>b \<in> Basis\<close>

proof (chain)
picking this:
  b \<in> Basis
have "((\<lambda>u. u ^ n * (h u \<bullet> b)) has_integral 0) {0 .. 1}" for n
using int_0[of n] has_integral_componentwise_iff[of "\<lambda>u. u ^ n *\<^sub>R h u" 0 "{0 .. 1}"]

proof (prove)
using this:
  b \<in> Basis
  ((\<lambda>u. u ^ n *\<^sub>R h u) has_integral (0::'a)) {0..1}
  ((\<lambda>u. u ^ n *\<^sub>R h u) has_integral (0::'a)) {0..1} =
  (\<forall>b\<in>Basis.
      ((\<lambda>x. x ^ n *\<^sub>R h x \<bullet> b) has_integral
       (0::'a) \<bullet> b)
       {0..1})

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ((\<lambda>u. u ^ n * (h u \<bullet> b)) has_integral 0) {0..1}
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  ((\<lambda>u. u ^ ?n * (h u \<bullet> b)) has_integral 0) {0..1}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>b.
       b \<in> Basis \<Longrightarrow> h u \<bullet> b = (0::'a) \<bullet> b
moreover

proof (state)
this:
  ((\<lambda>u. u ^ ?n * (h u \<bullet> b)) has_integral 0) {0..1}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>b.
       b \<in> Basis \<Longrightarrow> h u \<bullet> b = (0::'a) \<bullet> b
note u

proof (state)
this:
  0 \<le> u
  u \<le> 1

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>b.
       b \<in> Basis \<Longrightarrow> h u \<bullet> b = (0::'a) \<bullet> b
ultimately

proof (chain)
picking this:
  continuous_on {0..1} (\<lambda>x. h x \<bullet> b)
  ((\<lambda>u. u ^ ?n * (h u \<bullet> b)) has_integral 0) {0..1}
  0 \<le> u
  u \<le> 1
show "h u \<bullet> b = 0 \<bullet> b"

proof (prove)
using this:
  continuous_on {0..1} (\<lambda>x. h x \<bullet> b)
  ((\<lambda>u. u ^ ?n * (h u \<bullet> b)) has_integral 0) {0..1}
  0 \<le> u
  u \<le> 1

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. h u \<bullet> b = (0::'a) \<bullet> b
unfolding inner_zero_left

proof (prove)
using this:
  continuous_on {0..1} (\<lambda>x. h x \<bullet> b)
  ((\<lambda>u. u ^ ?n * (h u \<bullet> b)) has_integral 0) {0..1}
  0 \<le> u
  u \<le> 1

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. h u \<bullet> b = 0
by (rule lerch_lemma_real)

proof (state)
this:
  h u \<bullet> b = (0::'a) \<bullet> b

goal:
No subgoals!
qed
end
